title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“...the party consisted of Beckett, Dame Peggy Ashcroft, Harold Pinter, and the late Alan Webb.” [From The Times Diary, 12 May 1988, Simon Callow.]
